attributes.action: Petition to Ensure UK Council Elections are Held Regardless of Any Changes
attributes.additional_details: We urge the UK government to respect the democratic rights of its citizens and ensure that council elections are held as scheduled. Delaying or canceling these elections would be a disservice to democracy, to the will of the people, and to the trust that is vital for the health of our democratic institutions.
attributes.background:
What We Call For: 

• The commitment to uphold the timing and integrity of local council elections.

• Recognition of the importance of restoring public trust in government through consistent, fair, and timely democratic processes.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
